name: Tetrageddon Games
description:
Tetrageddon is a collection of games, strange rabbit holes, tangents, and a comedic digital nightmare about the internet of old.
It is a bizarre relic from the era of online Flash games, and pretty much delivers on as random of an experience as you would expect.
Each game is wildly different in terms of genre and gameplay. They all have their own silly tangents and Easter eggs to explore. You can spend hours getting lost.

Explore haunted desktops and abandoned spaces as you delve deeper into a pixelated fever dream. On your journey you will encounter silly characters and other oddities while you brave what feels like someone’s long forgotten games folder on a computer found during a garage sale.

Tetrageddon is a satire about our digital culture in the form of a strange collection of mini games. If you like random humor, warioware, miss the days of Flash game portals and the weird trappings of 90's nostalgia... then Tetrageddon is for you!

There are a total of ten mini-games that you can uncover. These range from Anatomically Incorrect Dinosaurs, a dinosaur assembly simulator... to Froggy (It's Hungry!), a post-apocalyptic game about a frog surviving on an international mega-highway at the end of the world.
Tetrageddon is the type of game that's hard to describe and best experienced for yourself.
